Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I only ever use AI for feedback if I’m really desperate, so it has impacted my learning far less.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I’ve never enjoyed reading the feedback from a teacher, and I find it much easier to read feedback from AI

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Feedback from a teacher can be more subjective, and I have often ignored some feedback because I disagreed with it. The feedback from AI is more objective and I have rarely ever thought that what it said was unjustifiable as it usually explains the reason why the change would be better.
